sections.heading: Schools; contract of employment; writing required
sections.text: A contract for the employment of a teacher or administrator for a public school in the State of Nebraska shall be in writing.SourceLaws 1943, c. 201, ยง 1, p. 672;R.S.1943, ยง 79-2146;Laws 1949, c. 256, ยง 348, p. 807;Laws 1971, LB 802, ยง 6;R.S.1943, (1
